posts.post_content:
Hi All,

I am selling the below T210 series 3 Morris horizontal card. The card is in poor condition with damage from scrapbook removal on the reverse. The front of the card also exhibits wear but also a relatively faint wet-sheet transfer. Overall, the card is in poor condition but one of the more desirable and only horizontal card from the entire set. 


This card is now sold.


Thank you,

Zach R1ce
